title: President Trump's Plan to Help End the War in Ukraine
summary: President Trump says the United States is making progress in trying to stop the war in Ukraine. He has sent two special helpers, or envoys, to talk with leaders from Russia and Ukraine. One envoy will meet with Russia's leader, Vladimir Putin, in Moscow, and another will talk with Ukrainian officials after meeting Russians in Abu Dhabi. Ukraine's president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, is happy about the progress and hopes to work closely with America. He believes that America's strength is important because Russia listens to them. The main issues still being discussed include whether Ukraine might have to give up some land to Russia to end the fighting. This news wrap also mentions other events, like Israel getting human remains from Gaza and the FBI wanting to interview some lawmakers.

moving forward or getting better in a situation
a country in Europe that is at war with Russia
a large country that is fighting with Ukraine
the leader of a country, like the United States
a time when there is no war or fighting

questions.question: Who is sending envoys to help end the war?
What are the envoys supposed to do?
Where is one envoy meeting Vladimir Putin?
Why is America involved in the Ukraine war?
What does Volodymyr Zelenskyy hope for?
What is a big issue in the talks?

background_read: The war in Ukraine started when Russia invaded Ukraine in 2022. Many countries, including the United States, are trying to help stop the fighting and find a peaceful solution. Envoys are special representatives who travel to discuss important matters. President Trump is the leader of the United States, and he is working with other leaders to resolve conflicts. Understanding this helps us see why peace talks are important for safety and cooperation in the world.
Article_Structure: WHO: President Trump, envoys Steve Witkoff and Dan Driscoll, and leaders from Ukraine and Russia
WHAT: Progress in peace efforts, with envoys sent to discuss ending the war
WHERE: Moscow, Abu Dhabi, and Ukraine
WHY: To resolve disagreements and achieve peace in Ukraine

perspectives.description: The U.S. is making progress and using its strength to help end the war.
Ukraine is hopeful and wants continued cooperation with America for security.
